statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE item_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_interactions WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, rating FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, item_id, rating FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM user_interactions WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, interaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND interaction_type = 'purchase'
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interaction_count >= 5 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT TOP 3 user_id, item_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, genre_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE rating_preference > 3;
SELECT user_id, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE genre_preference = 'Action' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE item_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 10;
SELECT user_id, genre_preference, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE rating_preference > 3 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, i.interaction_type, p.genre_preference FROM user_interactions i JOIN user_preferences p ON i.user_id = p.user_id JOIN user_interactions u ON i.item_id = u.item_id;
SELECT MAX(interaction_time) AS last_interaction_time, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT preference_category FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'like';
SELECT recommended_item, recommendation_timestamp FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'like'
SELECT user_id, preference_category FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'dislike'
SELECT recommended_item, COUNT(*) FROM Recommendations GROUP BY recommended_item HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM interaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, category_1, category_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 102;
SELECT item_id, recommended_items, confidence_level FROM recommendation_engine WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, name, age, location FROM user_profile WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM user_profile WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM interaction_history WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, category_1, category_2, category_3 FROM user_preferences WHERE category_1 = 'Sports' OR category_2 = 'Music'
SELECT item_id, recommended_items, confidence_level FROM recommendation_engine WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM user_profile JOIN interaction_history ON user_profile.user_id = interaction_history.user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, product_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND preference_score > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND product_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) FROM ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
